{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3324075,"name":"Robert Jones","username":"RDJ","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/ad7895/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-05T01:54:30.459Z","cooked":"

I am a new coach for FRC and the team is having issues. Any feedback would be appreciated!

We have three motors connected to three separate Spark Max controllers. The motors were unresponsive in our original configuration on the PWM. 
All controllers/motors are connected to ports 0-6. The motor on port 6 does not respond, but when I plug in into port 2 the motor responds. It seems as if ports 6-10 are not active (they show 6V when I test the pins). 
 I am guessing it is a coding issue and I know nothing about coding. Sparks were configured and are up to date. Any suggestions?

If you could provide some more info I’m sure someone will be able to help.

What programming language are you using?
Is your code available on GitHub that people can look at?
